text: Momentos Intimos () is a compilation album by American singer Selena. It was released on March 23, 2004. == About this album == An unreleased duet called "Puede Ser" () was included in the album. It was a duet with Nando "Guero" Dominguez. It was recorded two weeks before Selena was murdered. It then became the very last song to be recorded by her. "No Llores Mas Corazon" () and "Como Te Quiero Yo A Ti" () were digitally remastered. Both of those songs were turned into ballad songs. The album had bonus tracks that her family tells fans how it was like when Selena recorded those songs. The album peaked at number seven on the US Regional Mexican Albums Charts. The album also peaked at number eleven on the Top Latin Albums chart on Billboard in 2004. == Track listings == #Amor Prohibido #Missing My Baby #Fotos y Recuerdos #Dreaming of You #Buenos Amigos #I'm Getting Used to You #Donde Quiera Que Estes #Only Love #Tú Sólo Tú #I Could Fall in Love #Si Una Vez #Where Did the Feeling Go? #No Me Queda Mas #Como Te Quiero Yo A Ti #No Llores Mas Corazon #Puede Ser #Spoken Liner Notes - (Bonus track) #Spoken Liner Notes By The Band and Family == References == Category:Selena albums Category:2004 albums Category:Compilation albums
title: Momentos Intimos
